text: Juna manisaharu vyaja khanchan tini (cihanaharubata) yasa prakarale (bhramita bha'i) uthne chan jasto ki saitanale cho'eko pagala hos. Yo yasa karanale ki tiniharule bhanne gardathe ki vyapara garnu pani ta yastai cha, jasto ki byaja (linu). Tara vyaparala'i allahale halala (grahya) bana'eko cha ra byajala'i harama. Juna manisale aphno che'u allahako nirdesana pugepachi (byaja lina) tyagidiyo bhane jejati bha'isakeko cha, tyasako maphi pa'unecha. Ra tyasako nirnaya allahale garnecha. Ra yadi pheri (vyaja) lina thalyo bhane, tyasta manisaharu narakiya hunechan, ra sadhaim narkama rahane chan
